thread.title: Greek banks to reopen Monday, withdrawal limit relaxed
thread.title_full: Greek banks to reopen Monday, withdrawal limit relaxed

title: Greek banks to reopen Monday, withdrawal limit relaxed
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sat, Jul 18, 2015, 14:22 BST - UK Markets closed Greek banks to reopen Monday, withdrawal limit relaxed AFP – 56 minutes ago View Photo 

Greek banks will reopen Monday after a three-week closure and withdrawal limits have been relaxed, but capital controls remain in place, a government decree said. 
The decree sets a weekly withdrawal limit at 420 euros, with the daily limit remaining at 60 euros. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
